title: Census.gov is down
description: As of Friday, January 31, 2025 at 3:26pm PST, the U.S. Census Bureauâ€¦Tags: Census Bureau, government
author: Nathan Yau
excerpt: As of Friday, January 31, 2025 at 3:26pm PST, the U.S. Census Bureau homepage is blank. I did not see that coming. FAA.gov also appears to be down. Any others?
text: As of Friday, January 31, 2025 at 3:26pm PST, the U.S. Census Bureau homepage is blank. I did not see that coming. FAA.gov also appears to be down. Any others?
html:
As of Friday, January 31, 2025 at 3:26pm PST, the U.S. Census Bureau homepage is blank. I did not see that coming.

FAA.gov also appears to be down. Any others?
